title: I can't able to have internet access through USB tethering from my pixel 4a
content:
I tried sharing the internet from my pixel 4a via USB tethering but my computer doesn't showing anything or doesn't getting internet. I'm using USB type A to USB type C, there is no problem with the cable, I tried another device USB tethering and it's working perfectly with my computer but my pixel 4a USB tethering is not working. I switched no data transfer to USB tethering.
When I tried other device USB tethering, In device manager, I can able to see "Remote NDIS driver" but when I connect my pixel 4a, I can't able to see it. Please help me with this.
